artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; sailors rowing in a boat on right and center images; turbulent blue water, with three splashes on left; ship with black and white plumes of smoke on left
inscription: on right sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: 59698
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Records of the Hostilities between Japan and Russia (Nichiro kōsen kibun 日露交戰紀聞)
title: Naval Commander Hirose Takeo
